name: Rabbit X Wolf
description:
Roles: 

Ruiqi Gao: Programmer

Changyuan Huang: Music and sound effects Director/Composer

Yunxin Feng / Zhihao Chen: UI/UX Designer

Tusari Perera: Rabbit/Wolf Sprites and Animation

Story:

Starting in a treacherous forest, you will be a rabbit who needs to try its best to collect more carrots and avoid being attacked by wolves. Be a brave rabbit and go through the jungle to get more carrots!

CONTROLS

A - Left

D - Right

W - Jump

Esc - Pause Game

Assets:

Fantasy RPG Icon Pack by Franuka:

https://franuka.itch.io/rpg-icon-pack-demo

Free Platformer Game Tileset:

https://www.gameart2d.com/free-platformer-game-tileset.html
